text: Paul Leduc (11 March 1942 â€“ 21 October 2020) was a Mexican movie director. He was born in Mexico City. His career began in 1968. Leduc was known for directing Reed: Insurgent Mexico (1973) and Frida Still Life (1983). Leduc died on 21 October 2020 from problems caused by chronic obstructive pulmonary disease in Mexico City, aged 78.Fallece el cineasta mexicano Paul Leduc ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from COPD Category:Mexican movie directors Category:People from Mexico City
title: Paul Leduc
